description.value:
Some event has unstuck you in time. You might come from the distant past or a far-flung future. Perhaps you've traveled from some forsaken timeline to stop a cataclysmic event. Whatever the reason, you're now gifted with the ability to see and manipulate time in a way that few others comprehend.

Tradition occult

Paradox Skill Piloting

Paradox Spells cantrip: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.sNUvbMoMeLTnYJm8]{Injury Echo}; 1st: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aEM2cttJ2eYcLssW]{Fleet Step}; 2nd: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.H0WECXb2wvTHT9yk]{Temporal Bullets}; 3rd: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.GdlG9a4o0ax0F2HT]{Time's Edge}; 4th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.7Ib3qxIC0bFD3ued]{Weight of Ages}; 5th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.g58dbrP7FadZhh6j]{Chrono Push}; 6th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.0XP2XOxT9VSiXFDr]{Phantasmal Calamity}; 7th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.AlbpWWN87yGegoAF]{True Target}; 8th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4MOew29Z1oCX8O28]{Moment of Renewal}; 9th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.qsNeG9KZpODSACMq]{Foresight}

Warp Spells initial: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.1gkdgFwKfAoQx163]{Warp Time}; advanced: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.RDvWFbAaXtxrhJMD]{Accelerate}; greater: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.HzFdtjvRCFpb0NrS]{Time Loop}

Quantum Field You have a modicum of control of the temporal flow that surrounds you. An enemy creature that uses a move action inside your quantum field takes a â€“5-foot status penalty to its Speed during that action. You and your allies gain a +5-foot status bonus to Speed during move actions that are used inside your quantum field.
